ModMetaData.name: Research Info
ModMetaData.author: Reiquard
ModMetaData.description:
Research bench is no longer just a cumbersome object - now it shows useful info about currently performing research.
You don't need to open research window or to recall to find what kind of research is being performed - all you have to do is just click on that bulky thing called "research bench" and you will see the title, progress and even estimated time* to complete current project. *Estimated time only shown when research is actually being performed.
For more detailed information, open the "Project" tab attached to the bench.
Languages: English Russian Chinese (by HawnHan) Japanese external translation mod (by Proxyer): https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2291768407
